long_description: A first for Yakima, a fork-mount bike rack that attaches directly to most factory crossbars right out of the box! Meet the the Yakima Universal ForkLift. Rack installs quickly and easily, and it fits round, square and most factory crossbars. Rack is designed to accommodate most bike forks with disc brakes. Sliding wheel tray makes positioning the rear wheel simple. Lockable skewer has an integrated adjustment knob for simple 1-handed operation; SKS lock cores are sold separately. Sleek design and nice finish look great on your vehicle.
short_description: A first for Yakima, a fork-mount bike rack that attaches directly to most factory crossbars right out of the box! Meet the the Yakima Universal ForkLift.
